question: Titles of all papers in dblp published until 1940, their authors with names, and the year of publication
sparql:
PREFIX dblp: <https://dblp.org/rdf/schema#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?title ?author ?year WHERE {
  ?paper dblp:title ?title .
  ?paper dblp:authoredBy ?author_id .
  ?author_id rdfs:label ?author .
  ?paper dblp:yearOfPublication ?year .
  FILTER (?year <= "1940"^^xsd:gYear)
}
ORDER BY DESC(?year) ASC(?title)

question: All STOC 2018 papers, with each paperâ€™s total number of authors, number of ORCID-certified authors, and the percentage of authors with ORCIDs
All publications of Donald E. Knuth with label and number of citations, most cited first
sparql:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/>
PREFIX dblp: <https://dblp.org/rdf/schema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?publ (COUNT(?cite) AS ?count_cite) (SAMPLE(?label) AS ?sample_label) WHERE {
  ?publ rdf:type dblp:Publication .
  ?publ dblp:authoredBy ?author .
  ?publ rdfs:label ?label .
  ?author dblp:creatorName "Donald E. Knuth" .
  ?publ dblp:omid ?omid .
  ?cite cito:hasCitedEntity ?omid .
}
GROUP BY ?publ
ORDER BY DESC(?count_cite)

question: Count and percentage frequency of the main dblp type entities
Count and percentage frequency of the publication subtype entities
Count and percentage frequency of the creator subtype entities
Count and percentage frequency of the stream subtype entities
Count and percentage frequency of the external identifier entities by type
All papers published in SIGIR with title and publication year
sparql:
PREFIX dblp: <https://dblp.org/rdf/schema#>
SELECT ?paper ?title ?year WHERE {
  ?paper dblp:title ?title .
  ?paper dblp:publishedInStream <https://dblp.org/streams/conf/sigir> .
  ?paper dblp:yearOfPublication ?year .
}
ORDER BY DESC(?year)

question: Number of papers by stream
All SIGIR authors named like "M.*D.*" (case-insensitive) with their name and number of papers in SIGIR, most papers first
All papers in dblp until 1940 with title, author name, and year of publication
sparql:
PREFIX dblp: <https://dblp.org/rdf/schema#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?paper ?title ?author ?year WHERE {
  ?paper dblp:title ?title .
  ?paper dblp:authoredBy ?author_id .
  ?author_id rdfs:label ?author .
  ?paper dblp:yearOfPublication ?year .
  FILTER (?year <= "1940"^^xsd:gYear)
}
ORDER BY ASC(?year) ASC(?title)
